thread.section_title: The/Studio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The/Studio | thestudio.com | 2 of 18
thread.title: Bruce Alter

author: Bruce Alter
title: Bruce Alter
text: The Studio provided an excellent patch that met 90% of what we ordered. The patch itself is outstanding, as was the responsiveness of customer service. I deducted one star because we'd ordered a patch with a button loop and the first shipment had none. A second replacement shipment (at no cost) was just what we'd originally ordered. Both shipments arrived expeditiously.
